Text: I didn't know that they're making a series out of this NBC show.  Now, if only dynamite can make a deal with the syfy channel to make a comic series out of Alphas, Three Inches & The Invisible Man!

yknow, i bet if you hit up dynamite on twitter, they'd consider it.

don't miss grimm #0, search FCBD grimm and you'll find my torrent from free comic book day that had it.
